TestMapActivity
GameScreenActivity
DroneControlActivity
UseCaseSelectionActivity
ResultsScreenActivity

The forest fire example is a case of using the drone as a first responder in order to have awareness of the situation. Government uses of drones are primarily concerned with public safety, with them being used for search and rescue, disaster assessment/recovery and border security.

Drones have many uses in the agriculture industry including livestock, herd or wildlife management as seen in this example. Other agriculture use cases include monitoring crops and fields, managing coastal fisheries and monitoring the organic status of crop or livestock producers.

What you saw with the building with fire damage is an example of damage assessment for insurance industry. Other drone uses for the insurance industry include technical enablers that facilitate the capture, storage and analysis of UAV data and use by large insurance companies.

The example illustrates the sports game coverage for the media industry, although this is just one of many media drone use cases. Other media use cases in clude live streaming news broadcasts, breaking news coverage, and data analytics.

The energy use case seen in this demo is plant monitoring of a solar panel installation, but there are other energy-related use cases as well. These include data analytics for public utilities, oil or gas pipeline monitoring, pole and line monitoring and exploration research for new wells and resources.

The primary use case of drones for the healthcare industry is the rapid transportation of emergency supplies and communications/video capabilities connecting hospitals to the scene of the incident, as seen with this example. There is also some overlap with the government use cases, such as first responder for situational awareness.

TutorialActivity
Government
Wildfire assessment
Analyze the current state of a wildfire in order for firefighters to safely contain the fire
Move the drone to the goal marker without steering the drone into the fire
Your drone marker, control with arrow keys
The goal marker, steer the drone to this to complete the game
Avoid steering the drone into the fire
Agriculture
Livestock inspection
Gather the data from each of the livestock animals to see if they are healthy
Move the drone marker to all of the moving animal markers
Your drone marker, control with the arrow keys
An animal marker, move the drone to its circle to gather data
Insurance
Building damage assessment
An earthquake just hit Los Angeles, and you need to analyze the damage of a building
Move the drone to a room in the building to analyze it, visit all rooms to complete the game
Your drone marker, control with arrow keys
Avoid the walls, hitting them will result in a drone crash and a restart of the game
Indicates a visited room, game finishes when each room is lit up
Media
Gathering boat chase footage
A criminal is trying to escape by boat, cover the chase for the news station by following with a drone
Keep the drone within the circle to gather the footage, move outside and the game restarts
Your drone marker, control with arrow keys
The target, keep moving within the circle to finish the game
Avoid the red obstacles, hitting one will restart the game
Energy
Pipeline inspection
Inspect the oil pipeline to ensure that it is in good condition
Move the drone over the pipeline, each move counts as a point and game finishes after getting a certain number of points
Your drone marker, control with arrow keys
The pipeline, move within this to score points
The red squares mark the spots already visited
Healthcare
Deliver medical supplies
Houston has flooded and people around the city need emergency medical supplies
Gather supplies by entering the landing zone after each drop and deliver to each of the green markers
Your drone marker, control with arrow keys
Supply point, enter the circle to deliver supplies
Landing zone, move within this when the drone is blue to gather more supplies
